title: Process Concept
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
A Process is a **program in execution**. 
- **Text Section**: Code.
- **Data Section**: Global variables.
- **Stack**: Function calls.
- **Heap**: Dynamic memory.
Program is passive (file on disk). Process is active (in RAM).

examples.code:
Notepad.exe (Program)
Running 3 instances of Notepad (3 Processes).

summary: The fundamental unit of work in a system.
